ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup sweet Japanese plum wine
¼ cup soy sauce (such as Kikkoman®)
1 bunch green onions, finely chopped, or to taste

cookingTips: Marinate chicken for at least 2 hours or overnight for maximum flavor penetration
The combination of plum wine and honey creates a glaze that caramelizes beautifully on the grill
Don't discard marinade; reserve some to brush on chicken during grilling for extra flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This Japanese-inspired marinade balances sweet and savory. How would you adapt it for other proteins like pork or fish?
